title: Rebuild and redeploy Rweb Infotech dynamic laptop selling & services website

requirements.text: Rebuild and redeploy the entire Rweb Infotech application (frontend + backend) so it runs successfully in production without runtime errors, with all existing pages (Home, Products, Brands, Laptop Detail, About Us, Contact, Chat) loading correctly.

quotes: build a rweb infotech dynamic latop selling & sevices website based on html

acceptanceCriteria: Application deploys successfully to the Internet Computer without build or runtime errors
Home page loads with hero section, call-to-action buttons, and features section
Products page displays all laptop models in a searchable and filterable grid
Laptop Detail page shows image gallery, variant selector, and full specifications
About Us page displays descriptive content about Rweb Infotech
Contact page displays company location with Google Maps link, CEO name, and phone number
Chat page loads with AI assistant avatar and message interface
Site header shows Rweb Infotech logo, search bar, and navigation links (Home, Products, About Us, Contact, Chat) with working mobile menu
Site footer shows About Us text, Google Maps location link, CEO name, and contact phone number

requirements.text: Ensure the visual theme across all pages is dynamic and engaging with a warm orange/amber color palette (non-blue/purple), consistent typography, spacing, hover effects on product cards, and smooth transitions on interactive elements.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages use the warm orange/amber OKLCH color system defined in index.css
Product cards display visible hover effects (shadow lift, scale, or color change)
Navigation links show active state highlighting
Transitions and animations are consistent across all interactive elements
Theme is coherent on both desktop and mobile viewports

requirements.text: Ensure all required generated static images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are correctly referenced throughout the UI, including the Rweb Infotech logo, hero/banner image, brand placeholder images, and laptop product images.
acceptanceCriteria: Rweb Infotech logo image is present and renders in the site header
Hero/banner image is present and renders on the Home page
Brand placeholder images are present and shown for brands without real logos
Laptop product placeholder images are present and used in product cards and detail pages when real images are missing
No broken image links appear anywhere in the UI

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
All Motoko backend logic must remain in a single actor in backend/main.mo
Do not use blue or purple as the primary palette color
Generated images must be served as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, not through the backend
nonGoals: Adding new product categories or data not already in the backend seed data
Integrating external payment gateways beyond the existing configurable PhonePe UPI link
Adding real-time features or WebSocket communication
Changing the authentication system away from Internet Identity
